experiment¶

Entry point for manipulating Experiments. Provides the following operations:

experiment_operations.op_list(experiment_names) Print a table of the ExDs definitions known to MBFF.
experiment_operations.op_run(experiment_names) Run the Experiments.
experiment_operations.op_lock(experiment_names) Lock the Experiments.
experiment_operations.op_unlock(experiment_names) Unlock the Experiments.
experiment_operations.op_desc(experiment_names) Print a description of the Experiments.
experiment_operations.op_alg_runs_print_to_csv(…) Deprecated.
experiment_operations.op_alg_runs_delete(…) Deprecated.
experiment.create_argument_parser()[source]¶

Instantiates and configures an ArgumentParser.

experiment.entry_point_experiment()[source]¶

Main function of the entry-point experiment.

Invokes the corresponding operation on the Experiments specified as targets. See Defined operations.

Command-line usage¶

usage: experiment [-h] [-c | -d]
                  {list,desc,run,lock,unlock,alg-runs,build-ks-gamma} targets
                  [targets ...]

Positional Arguments¶

operation

Possible choices: list, desc, run, lock, unlock, alg-runs, build-ks-gamma

The operation to be performed on the targets.

Default: “list”

targets

The experiment to perform the operation on.

Default: [‘all’]

Named Arguments¶

-c, --print-to-csv
 

Load saved AlgorithmRun instances and convert them to CSV.

Default: “print_to_csv”

-d, --delete

Delete saved AlgorithmRun instances.

Default: “print_to_csv”

Defined operations¶

Each Experiment operation is represented by a callback with the conventional name op_[OperationName]. Each such callback receives a list of Experiment definition names, representing the Experiments to act on.

experiment_operations.op_list(experiment_names)[source]¶

Print a table of the ExDs definitions known to MBFF.

See Experimental infrastructure on how to write Experiment definitions.

experiment_operations.op_run(experiment_names)[source]¶

Run the Experiments.

experiment_operations.op_lock(experiment_names)[source]¶

Lock the Experiments.

experiment_operations.op_unlock(experiment_names)[source]¶

Unlock the Experiments.

experiment_operations.op_desc(experiment_names)[source]¶

Print a description of the Experiments.

experiment_operations.op_alg_runs_print_to_csv(experiment_names)[source]¶

Deprecated. To be moved to the entry point analysis_exprun.

experiment_operations.op_alg_runs_delete(experiment_names)[source]¶

Deprecated. To be moved to the entry point analysis_exprun.

Utility functions¶

A collection of functions required by multiple operations defined in the experiment_operations module.
